channel.title: {delta} range help!
channel.description:
ok guys i have just added some new custom bow's and crossbows to my server.... i added them to range they dont shoot arrows yet they still attack like a crystalbow ... but they shoot arrows when they are in wildy but.... they level melee stats...eg. attack defence and strength... here is some pics =\ please help

the last 1 is me doin spec............... [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/nd4j8m.jpg[/img]
